general_instructions: For requesting task, user needs to provide the preferred food, area, price range or the restaurant name directly for choosing a particular restaurant. system needs to inform the restaurant name, food, price range, address, phone number, postcode when requested.  For booking a table, user needs to inform the booking day, number of people and the booking time. system needs to inform the reference number when booking is successful.
belief_instructions: belief instructions: restaurant name = pizza hut city, golden wok, etc.; food = dont care, chinese, mediterranean, british, etc.; pricerange = dontcare, cheap, moderate, expensive; area = dont care, centre, east, north, south, west ; booking_day = monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday; booking_people = 1,2,3,4,5,6,7; booking_time = 12:15, 13:30, etc

beliefs.user_search_restaurant_w_price_food: user: i'm looking for a restaurant that offers [value_food] food in a [value_price] price range.
beliefs.user_search_restaurant_w_price_area: user : i need an [value_price] restaurant in the [value_area].
beliefs.user_search_restaurant_w_food_area: user : i'm looking for a restaurant in the [value_area] and serve [value_food] food.
beliefs.user_search_restaurant_w_area: user : i am looking for a restaurant on the [value_area] side of town.
beliefs.user_search_restaurant_w_food: user : i want somewhere that serves [value_food] food.
beliefs.user_search_restaurant_w_price: user : i want to eat at a [value_price] restaurant please
beliefs.user_search_restaurant_name: user : i am looking for information on the [restaurant_name].
beliefs.user_book_table: user : could you book me a table for [value_count] at [value_time] on [value_day]?
beliefs.user_food_dontcare: user : i don't care about the type of food/cuisine.
beliefs.user_pricerange_dontcare: user : the price range doesn't matter.
beliefs.user_area_dontcare: user : i don't care about the area.
beliefs.user_search_restaurant_noinfo: user : i could really use something to eat.

replies.user_search_res_kb_none: user : i am looking for a restaurant. <kb> restaurant zero </kb>
replies.system_no_found: system : i cannot find any restaurant -s matching your request . can i find something else for you instead ?
replies.user_ask_reference_num: user: please give me the reference number.
replies.system_inform_booking_w_reference: restaurant (booking (name), inform (reference)) system : booking was successful at [restaurant_name] . reference number is [restaurant_reference] .
replies.system_inform_restaurant_name_food_area_: system : the [restaurant_name] serves [value_food] food , is located in the [value_area] part of town and in the [value_pricerange] price range .
replies.system_inform_name_food_area_price_addre: restaurant (inform (name, price, food, area, address, postcode, phone)) system : [restaurant_name] is a [value_pricerange] [value_food] place in the [value_area] at [restaurant_address] [restaurant_postcode] . the phone number is [restaurant_phone].
replies.system_inform_restaurant_price_ask_food: restaurant (inform (choices), request (food)) system : [value_place] offers [value_count] [value_pricerange] -ly priced restaurant -s . what sort of cuisine would you like ?
replies.system_ask_narrow_food_price: restaurant (inform (choices), request (food, price)) system : i have over [value_count] restaurant -s to choose from , would you mind narrowing down your search for me with perhaps a food type or price range ?
replies.user_search_restaurant_w_price_area: user : i need an [value_price] restaurant in the [value_area].
replies.system_inform_choices_ask_area_price: restaurant (inform (name, food, area, price), require (more)) system : [restaurant_name] serves [value_food] food , is in the [value_area] part of town and in the [value_pricerange] price range . would you like their location ?
replies.system_inform_choices_price_area_ask_foo: restaurant (inform (name, food, area)) system : how about [restaurant_name] , a nice [value_food] place in the [value_area].
replies.system_inform_restaurant_name_price_area: restaurant (inform (choices), request (price)) system : there are several restaurant -s in the [value_area] part of town . would you like something in the [value_pricerange] , [value_pricerange] or [value_pricerange] price range ?
replies.system_ask_price_food: system : do you have a certain price range or food type you are looking for ?
replies.system_inform_restaurant_name_price_food: system : [restaurant_name] is a [value_pricerange] -ly priced restaurant offering [value_food] cuisine . would you like any other information ?
replies.system_inform_food_area_ask_price: restaurant (inform (name, area, price), require(more)) system : [restaurant_name] restaurant in the [value_area] part of town and in the [value_pricerange] price range . would you like more information for them ?
replies.user_search_restaurant_w_price_food: user: i'm looking for a restaurant that offers [value_food] food in a [value_price] price range.
replies.system_inform_restaurant_name_price_food: restaurant (inform (name, price, food, area), require (booking)) system : [restaurant_name] is an [value_pricerange] [value_food] restaurant on the [value_area] side . would you like to book there ?
replies.user_search_restaurant_name: user : i am looking for information on the [restaurant_name].
replies.system_inform_restaurant_name_food_area_: restaurant (inform (name, price, food, area, phone), require (booking)) system : [restaurant_name] is an [value_food] restaurant in the [value_area] . their phone number is [restaurant_phone] . would you like me to make a reservation for you ?
replies.user_ask_area: user : which part of town it is in ?
replies.system_inform_area: restaurant (inform (name, area)) system : [restaurant_name] is located in the [value_area] part of town
replies.system_inform_address: restaurant (inform (name, address)) system: [restaurant_name] is located at [restaurant_address].
replies.user_ask_phone: user: can i get the phone number?
replies.system_inform_phone: restaurant (inform (name, phone), require (more)) system: the [restaurant_name]'s phone number is [restaurant_phone]. is there anything else i can help with ?
replies.system_inform_postcode: restaurant (inform (postcode), require (more)) system: their postcode is [restaurant_postcode]. do you need anything else?
replies.user_ask_address_phone: user : what is the address and phone number?
replies.system_inform_address_phone: system : [restaurant_name] is located at [restaurant_address] and their phone number is [restaurant_phone].
replies.user_ask_address_postcode: user : what is the address and postcode?
replies.system_inform_address_postcode: system : [restaurant_name] is located at [restaurant_address] and their postal code is [restaurant_postcode].
replies.user_ask_phone_postcode: user : what is the phone number and postcode?
replies.system_inform_phone_postcode: system : the phone is [restaurant_phone] and the postcode is [restaurant_postcode]
replies.system_inform_another: system : there is [restaurant_name] if you are looking for a [value_pricerange] restaurant .
replies.user_book_table: user : can you book the table for [value_count] people at [value_time] on [value_day] please?
replies.system_inform_booking_successful: restaurant (booking (name, day, time), inform (reference)) system : i have made a reservation for you at the [restaurant_name] on [value_day] at [value_time] for [value_count] people. your reference number is [restaurant_reference].
replies.user_thanks: user: thanks for all your help.
replies.system_ask_more: restaurant (require (more)) system : no problem . did you need anything else ?
replies.user_nomore: user : nope, that covers all my needs. thanks.
replies.system_general_bye: restaurant (general (bye)) system : thank you for using the [value_place] towninfo centre. have a nice day !
replies.system_bye: restaurant (general (bye)) system: you are welcome, goodbye.
replies.user_ask_food: user: what type of food do they serve?
replies.user_search_restaurant_price_food_area: user: i need a [value_food] restaurant in the [value_area], and is [value_pricerange].
replies.system_inform_restaurant_name_price_food: restaurant (inform (name, food, price, area)) system : how about [restaurant_name] ? it serves [value_food] food in the [value_pricerange] price range in the [value_area].
